channel.title: Blogdown on Data Curious
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown on Data Curious

item.title: Getting Started with a Blog
item.description: I have been creating this blog in my mind for months and hey I finally did it! Below I will show you how I set up my personal blog using R Blogdown, Hugo, Github and Netlify. I will continuously update and improve it. Comments or suggestions on how to improve it are welcome :-) To begin with, you will need the following to set up your blog Install Blogdown.
